body.p: I should like to come over Saturday, be there about noon—will come up in the horse cars—will spend some hours with Mr. Clifford, & if you come home early enough, and the weather good, we may have a (longer or shorter) drive, before supper—will leave the question of my stopping over Sunday, open.
